TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DownloadApplicationCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LogFilePath As String
public: property System::String ^ LogFilePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ClickOnce 記錄檔的路徑。

span.span: Gets the path of the ClickOnce log file.
The path of the ClickOnce log file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ShortcutAppId As String
public: property System::String ^ ShortcutAppId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 .appref-ms 檔案的內容，此檔案可以啟動這個 ClickOnce 應用程式。

span.span: Gets the contents of an .appref-ms file that can launch this ClickOnce application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會包含文字.appref ms 檔案啟動這個 ClickOnce 應用程式可以寫入自訂安裝程式。This property contains the text a custom installer can write to a .appref-ms file to launch this ClickOnce application. ClickOnce 會為您建立這個啟動檔案安裝在離線時，除了包含應用程式的 ClickOnce 應用程式時``項目。ClickOnce creates this launch file for you when install a ClickOnce application that is available offline, except for applications that include the `` element. 自訂安裝程式可以建立捷徑，以啟動 ClickOnce 應用程式，其中包含``新.appref ms 檔案以 Unicode 格式的文字寫入這個屬性中的項目。A custom installer can create a shortcut to launch a ClickOnce application that contains a `` element by writing the text in this property to a new .appref-ms file in Unicode format. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ <entryPoint>元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f)和[逐步解說： 建立自訂安裝程式的 ClickOnce 應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb222cc5-8aeb-4b94-8c49-b93e342f5f69)。For more information, see [<entryPoint> Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f) and [Walkthrough: Creating a Custom Installer for a ClickOnce Application](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb222cc5-8aeb-4b94-8c49-b93e342f5f69).
